/api/mo/uni/infra/vlanns-[mycf0-pool]-static.json
{
    "fvnsVlanInstP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "mycf0-pool",
            "allocMode": "static"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "fvnsEncapBlk": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "allocMode": "static",
                        "from": "vlan-4001",
                        "to": "vlan-4001"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}

    "fvnsMcastAddrInstP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "mycf0-mpool",
            "dn": "uni/infra/maddrns-mycf0-mpool"

        "children": [
            {
                "fvnsMcastAddrBlk": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "from": "225.2.1.1",
                        "to": "225.2.255.255"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}

/api/mo/uni/vmmp-CloudFoundry/dom-mycf0.json

    "vmmDomP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "mycf0",
            "mode": "cf",
            "enfPref": "sw",
            "encapMode": "vxlan",
            "prefEncapMode": "vxlan",
            "mcastAddr": "225.1.2.3"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "vmmCtrlrP": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "mycf0",
                        "mode": "cf",
                        "scope": "cloudfoundry",
                        "hostOrIp": "1.1.1.1"
                    }
                }
            },
            {
                "vmmRsDomMcastAddrNs": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "tDn": "uni/infra/maddrns-mycf0-mpool"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}

        "attributes": {
            "name": "cf-aep"

/api/mo/uni/tn-common.json
{
    "fvTenant": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "common",
            "dn": "uni/tn-common"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "vzFilter": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "mycf0-allow-all-filter"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "vzEntry": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "allow-all"
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            },
            {
                "vzBrCP": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "mycf0-l3out-allow-all"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "vzSubj": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "allow-all-subj",
                                    "consMatchT": "AtleastOne",
                                    "provMatchT": "AtleastOne"
                                },
                                "children": [
                                    {
                                        "vzRsSubjFiltAtt": {
                                            "attributes": {
                                                "tnVzFilterName": "mycf0-allow-all-filter"
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}

/api/node/mo/uni/userext/user-mycf0.json
{
    "aaaUser": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "mycf0",
            "accountStatus": "active",
            "pwd": "NotRandom!"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "aaaUserDomain": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "all"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "aaaUserRole": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "admin",
                                    "privType": "writePriv"
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}
/api/node/mo/uni/userext/user-mycf0.json
{
    "aaaUser": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "mycf0"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "aaaUserCert": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "mycf0.crt",
